SEARCH
Package it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.event

Class Event

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.event.Event
Direct Known Subclasses:
Concert, Festival, Other, Theater
public abstract class Event extends Object
Abstract class that represents a generic Event. Contains attributes and methods common to Concert, Festival, Theater and Other.
